citations.narrative:
Upon arrival the inspector noticed a new, unknown female operating the facility. After talking to the woman, it was
determined that the previous licensee had sold the business to this new person. The licensee notified the inspector via
email on 6/26/2023 that she had placed all of the cats and was no longer breeding, but never stated that the license
needed to be cancelled or that the business was sold. The sales document for the business was signed on 6/26/23 by the
new owner and signed on 6/29/23 by the previous licensee. This email notification was not submitted at least 90 days
before the substantial control or ownership of the business changed. The new owner isn’t conducting regulated activity at
this time but will be obtaining a USDA license soon. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days before any
change in the name, address, or substantial control or ownership of the business or operation.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the new owner of the facility.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
Upon arrival the inspector noticed a new, unknown female operating the facility. After talking to the woman, it was 
determined that the previous licensee had sold the business to this new person. The licensee notified the inspector via 
email on 6/26/2023 that she had placed all of the cats and was no longer breeding, but never stated that the license 
needed to be cancelled or that the business was sold. The sales document for the business was signed on 6/26/23 by the 
new owner and signed on 6/29/23 by the previous licensee. This email notification was not submitted at least 90 days 
before the substantial control or ownership of the business changed. The new owner isn’t conducting regulated activity at 
this time but will be obtaining a USDA license soon. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days before any 
change in the name, address, or substantial control or ownership of the business or operation. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the new owner of the facility.
